channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking lot in the back of 40 Meeting House Lane continuously has lots trash being dumped by a flytipper., 19th August
item.description:
I have the licence plate, pictures and videos. Would like this to investigated asap.

item.title: Root of tree lifted out o/s 182, 19th August
item.description:
Resident reporting her sister lives at 182 and the tree o/s her property the roots of the tree have been lifted out of the tarmac and there has been an incident with someone on a mobility scooter who crashed into the brick wall and the broken bricks are still out there as well they have fallen into her garden. Sister who is 83 yrs old has had a stroke and would like someone to look into this issue asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
